item.title: Become 2D
item.description: Hi ppl ! New Friday came, and new update follows. So there are 2 big changes. Again all based on your mega-awesome feedback ! Thanks a lot for that ! :) Change #1: Networking Feedback: This would be awesome to play this game easy on website. There are several problems here: - I picked standard unity networking engine: UNet. - in UNet connection matchmaking is somewhat slow. - UNet feels quite limited in terms of extra features and integration outside of Unity

item.title: New Web Site
item.description: I riched the point when sharing game binaries through skype or dropbox became just time-consuming. So I thought, it’s a good moment to finally launch a simple website where I would keep and share all versions of the game. My last own site was built with HUGO and I got quite a good experience using that. Though I still felt a bit uncomfortable with HUGO templating DSL. So I’ve decided to look for something more familiar and expressive.
